A2 a person who sings: Bryn Terfel is a famous singer from Wales. Are you a good singer? Synonym
vocalistCompare
songstress literary
More examplesFewer examplesHe was an amateur singer until the age of 40, when he turned professional.An excited crowd waited for the singer to arrive.She first rose to fame as a singer at the age of 16.The lead singer has a falsetto voice.He fancies himself as a bit of a singer.
